name: state-channel-contract
description: State channel contract to manage wireless internet access micro-payments

scripts.lint: npx eslint utils/*.js && npx eslint tests/*.js && solhint contracts/*.sol
scripts.lintandtest: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.deploylintandtest: npm run deploy && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.ci: while inotifywait -e close_write contracts/*.sol tests/*.js; do npm run deploylintandtest; done
